name: cursed-body

effect.x-y: Moves that hit this Pokémon have a 30% chance of being Disabled afterward.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Moves that hit this Pokémon have a 30% chance of being Disabled afterward.

short_effect: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.
